original: @426a rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @426a rgya gar skad du /

original: a'arya aa bha ya pra d'a n'a ma aa pa r'a dzi ta /
analyzed: a'arya aa bha ya pra d'a n'a ma aa pa r'a dzi ta /

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /

original: 'phags pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa zhes bya ba /
analyzed: 'phags pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa zhes bya ba /
translated: Noble One Who Cannot Be Conquered, Giver of Fearlessness

original: sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to all the Buddhas and Bodhisattvas!

original: grub pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: grub pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //

original: sangs rgyas @426b la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: sangs rgyas @426b la phyag 'tshal lo //

original: chos la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: chos la phyag 'tshal lo //

original: dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo //

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo //🔽sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal sel ba la phyag 'tshal lo //🔽sems can thams cad sdug bsngal las grol bar mdzad pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo // sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal sel ba la phyag 'tshal lo // sems can thams cad sdug bsngal las grol bar mdzad pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the noble Avalokiteśvara, the Bodhisattva Mahāsattva endowed with great compassion!🔽Homage to the one who removes the suffering of all beings!🔽Homage to the one who liberates all beings from suffering!

original: sems can thams cad kyi bcings pa gcod pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi bcings pa gcod pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the one who cuts the bonds of all beings!

original: sems can thams cad la mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: sems can thams cad la mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the one who grants fearlessness to all sentient beings.

original: de nas 'jigs pa med pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i snying po brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: de nas 'jigs pa med pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i snying po brjod par bya'o //
translated: Then one should recite the invincible essence mantra of the fearless noble Avalokiteśvara:

original: las kun byed pa dge ba ste //
analyzed: las kun byed pa dge ba ste //
translated: It is virtuous, performing all activities,🔽Frightening all spirits,

original: 'byung po kun gyis 'jigs pa med; ;bdud rtsi las ni bdud rtsi 'byung /
analyzed: 'byung po kun gyis 'jigs pa med; ;bdud rtsi las ni bdud rtsi 'byung /

original: 'di ni las kun byed pa yin //
analyzed: 'di ni las kun byed pa yin //
translated: This is the performer of all activities.

original: dgra kun 'jigs par byed pa ste //
analyzed: dgra kun 'jigs par byed pa ste //
translated: It frightens all enemies,🔽In disputes and battles,🔽And also in circles of enemies,🔽In the midst of disputes,🔽Always encountering enemies,

original: rtsod dang de bzhin 'thab pa dang // gzhan yang dgras ni 'khor ba dang // rtsod pa'i nang du rtsod byed dang // rtag tu dgra dang 'phrad pa dang // rmugs par byed cing rengs par byed //
analyzed: rtsod dang de bzhin 'thab pa dang // gzhan yang dgras ni 'khor ba dang // rtsod pa'i nang du rtsod byed dang // rtag tu dgra dang 'phrad pa dang // rmugs par byed cing rengs par byed //

original: rmongs par byed cing sdig pa sel //
analyzed: rmongs par byed cing sdig pa sel //
translated: It deludes and removes negativity,🔽It dispels poison and fire,

original: dug dang me ni dengs par byed; ;rims dang nyes sdig thams cad sel //
analyzed: dug dang me ni dengs par byed; ;rims dang nyes sdig thams cad sel //
translated: And removes all fevers and negativity.

original: chom rkun dang ni chu dang sbrul //
analyzed: chom rkun dang ni chu dang sbrul //
translated: It removes thieves, water, and snakes,

original: rmi lam ngan pa thams cad sel //
analyzed: rmi lam ngan pa thams cad sel //

original: 'byung po thams cad zlog pa yin //🔽sangs rgyas byang @427a *//
analyzed: 'byung po thams cad zlog pa yin // sangs rgyas byang @427a *//
translated: And repels all bhūtas.🔽It leads to the enlightenment of the buddhas

original: chub 'dren pa dang // chos kun rab tu ston pa ste //
analyzed: chub 'dren pa dang // chos kun rab tu ston pa ste //

original: 'di ni rig sngags mthu stobs can //
analyzed: 'di ni rig sngags mthu stobs can //

original: gzhan gyis mi thub srin po 'joms //
analyzed: gzhan gyis mi thub srin po 'joms //
translated: And conquers rākṣasas that cannot be subdued by others.

original: gang tshe rig sngags 'di 'chang ba //
analyzed: gang tshe rig sngags 'di 'chang ba //

original: des na sa 'di g-yo bar 'gyur //🔽'jigs med ldan pa zhes bya ba'i //
analyzed: des na sa 'di g-yo bar 'gyur // 'jigs med ldan pa zhes bya ba'i //
translated: Then this earth will shake.🔽The unsurpassed king of vidyās

original: rig sngags rgyal ba bla na med //
analyzed: rig sngags rgyal ba bla na med //

original: 'jigs rten mgon pos gsungs pa ste //
analyzed: 'jigs rten mgon pos gsungs pa ste //
translated: Was taught by the Lord of the World

original: 'jig rten gsum po kun gyis mchod //
analyzed: 'jig rten gsum po kun gyis mchod //
translated: And is worshipped in all three worlds.

original: de nas 'jigs pa med pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis de bzhin gshegs pa rjes su dran par byas nas rang gi snying po gzhan gyis mi thub pa /
analyzed: de nas 'jigs pa med pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis de bzhin gshegs pa rjes su dran par byas nas rang gi snying po gzhan gyis mi thub pa /
translated: Then Avalokiteśvara, the fearless one, recollecting the Tathāgata, spoke this invincible essence

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs pa 'di smras so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs pa 'di smras so //
translated: That was taught by all the tathāgatas:

original: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis byang chub sems dpa' mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa la 'di skad ces smras so //
analyzed: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis byang chub sems dpa' mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa la 'di skad ces smras so //
translated: Then the bodhisattva mahāsattva Avalokiteśvara, endowed with loving-kindness, said this to the bodhisattva Abhayada:

original: mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa /
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa /

original: sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na 'jigs rten gyi khams gang+g'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa /
analyzed: sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na 'jigs rten gyi khams gang+g'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa /
translated: in the past, beyond as many eons as there are grains of sand in the Ganges River, there appeared in the world a thus-gone, worthy, perfect buddha endowed with knowledge and conduct,🔽the sugata, the knower of the world, the unsurpassed guide for those to be tamed, the teacher of gods and humans, the enlightened one, the blessed one named Paramapuruṣa.

original: sems can thams cad la phan 'dogs pa /
analyzed: sems can thams cad la phan 'dogs pa /

original: gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i dbang phyug 'od ces bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste /
analyzed: gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i dbang phyug 'od ces bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste /
translated: He was called the light of the invincible lord.

original: de las bdag gis 'di dag thos so //
analyzed: de las bdag gis 'di dag thos so //
translated: I have heard this from him.

original: de las bzung nas byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / sems can thams cad la yang bsnyad do //
analyzed: de las bzung nas byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / sems can thams cad la yang bsnyad do //
translated: Having received it from him, I have also taught it to all bodhisattvas and sentient beings.

original: mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i snying po 'di ni /
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i snying po 'di ni /
translated: This essence of invincibility, which grants fearlessness,

original: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bdun po rnams par gzigs dang / gtsug tor can dang / thams cad skyob dang / 'khor ba 'jig dang / gser thub dang / 'od srung dang / sh'akya thub pa rnams kyis gsungs so //
analyzed: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bdun po rnams par gzigs dang / gtsug tor can dang / thams cad skyob dang / 'khor ba 'jig dang / gser thub dang / 'od srung dang / sh'akya thub pa rnams kyis gsungs so //
translated: was taught by the seven perfect buddhas: Vipaśyin, Śikhin, Viśvabhū, Krakucchanda, Kanakamuni, Kāśyapa, and Śākyamuni.

original: gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i snying po 'di ni /
analyzed: gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i snying po 'di ni /

original: bdag srung ba dang / gzhan @428a *//
analyzed: bdag srung ba dang / gzhan @428a *//

original: srung ba dang / gnyi ga srung ba dang / grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang srung ba dang / srog skyong ba dang / tshe sbyin pa dang / lag ba rengs par byed pa dang /
analyzed: srung ba dang / gnyi ga srung ba dang / grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang srung ba dang / srog skyong ba dang / tshe sbyin pa dang / lag ba rengs par byed pa dang /
translated: protects others, protects both, and protects villages, towns, cities, regions, countries, royal palaces, preserves life, grants longevity, paralyzes the arms of enemies,

original: 'thab mo dang / 'thab pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / rtsod pa thams cad zlog par byed pa /
analyzed: 'thab mo dang / 'thab pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / rtsod pa thams cad zlog par byed pa /

original: dgra thams cad zlog pa /
analyzed: dgra thams cad zlog pa /

original: 'ching ba thams cad grol bar byed pa /
analyzed: 'ching ba thams cad grol bar byed pa /

original: thams cad du gzhan gyi mi thub pa'o //
analyzed: thams cad du gzhan gyi mi thub pa'o //
translated: It is invincible to others in every way.

original: shuddhe mukte / pra bha sva re /
analyzed: shuddhe mukte / pra bha sva re /

original: shv'a te / panda ra h'a si ni /
analyzed: shv'a te / panda ra h'a si ni /

original: sarba dushta na dza bha ya mi /
analyzed: sarba dushta na dza bha ya mi /
translated: sarva duṣṭa na ja bhaya mi

analyzed: stam bha ya mi /

original: mo ha ya mi /
analyzed: mo ha ya mi /

analyzed: aom sv'ah'a / pa bi tre sv'ah'a /

analyzed: shve ti sv'ah'a /

analyzed: shve te pa ta pri te sv'ah'a /

analyzed: tadya th'a / ta re ta re /

original: ta ri ni raksha raksha /
analyzed: ta ri ni raksha raksha /

analyzed: sarba ka li /

analyzed: ka la ha / bi gra ha /

original: bi bha dhi /
analyzed: bi bha dhi /

original: du:sva ba na bha ye bhya:sv'ah'a /🔽rtag tu le lo med par ni //
analyzed: du:sva ba na bha ye bhya:sv'ah'a / rtag tu le lo med par ni //
translated: duḥsvapna bhaya bhyaḥ svāhā🔽Whoever always upholds this dhāraṇī

original: gang zhig gzungs 'di 'chang byed pa //🔽de la lha tshogs thams cad kyang //
analyzed: gang zhig gzungs 'di 'chang byed pa // de la lha tshogs thams cad kyang //
translated: without laziness🔽will be protected by all hosts of gods

original: dus kun tu ni srung bar byed //
analyzed: dus kun tu ni srung bar byed //

original: de ni 'jigs par 'gyur ba med; ;de ni rtag srung lhan ner 'dug /
analyzed: de ni 'jigs par 'gyur ba med; ;de ni rtag srung lhan ner 'dug /
translated: he is always protected and serene.

original: ji ltar nyi ma sa steng na //
analyzed: ji ltar nyi ma sa steng na //
translated: Just as the sun in the sky

original: gzi brjid grags 'chang lhan ne bzhin //
analyzed: gzi brjid grags 'chang lhan ne bzhin //
translated: shines brightly,🔽he is not harmed by spells,

original: de la gshed byed byad stems dang // srul po dag gis mi tshugs te //
analyzed: de la gshed byed byad stems dang // srul po dag gis mi tshugs te //
translated: by sorcery or by evil spirits.

original: de la dpal yon 'jug par 'gyur //
analyzed: de la dpal yon 'jug par 'gyur //

original: kha dog dang ni tshe yang 'phel //
analyzed: kha dog dang ni tshe yang 'phel //
translated: his complexion and life will improve.

original: 'phags pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa zhes bya ba rdzogs so //
analyzed: 'phags pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa zhes bya ba rdzogs so //
translated: The noble Aparajita, the giver of fearlessness, is complete.

original: @428b rgya gar gyi mkhan po pradzny'a wa rma dang / zhu chen gyi lotstsha ba bandhe ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la bab pa /
analyzed: @428b rgya gar gyi mkhan po pradzny'a wa rma dang / zhu chen gyi lotstsha ba bandhe ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la bab pa /
translated: Translated, edited, and finalized by the Indian preceptor Prajñāvarman and the great editor-translator Bandé Yeshé Dé and others.
